{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer D7 |revision=v1.x |asin=B00IU85YE6 |newegg=N82E16833704227 |price=170 |series=AC1750 |fcc_date=10/22/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, dsl modem |fcc_id=TE7D7V1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |cpu1_cspeed=720 |cpu2_brand=Broadcom |cpu2_model=BCM6318 |cpu2_cspeed=333 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model= |fla2=8 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2=64 |ram2_brand=ESMT |ram2_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |flags=ADSL2+ |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_2.4GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$,,, ^TP-LINK_5GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC1750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit ADSL2+ Modem Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/cat-5512_Archer-D7.html}} {{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|region=us|model=Archer-D7}} {{•}} [http://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/Archer_D7/index.htm Firmware Interface] The QCA9880 on this device is on the main board, not on
a separate Mini-PCIe module like the [[TP-LINK Archer C7]]. *Ports: USB: 2x USB 2.0 :xDSL: 1x ADSL2+ (RJ11) [ADSL] :WAN: 1x GbE (RJ45) [WAN/LAN4] :LAN: 4x GbE (RJ45) [LAN1-LAN4] *Wireless Standards: :802.11abgn/ac (2.4/5GHz) *Antenna: :Type: Three detachable dual band external antennas :Gain: 3x ext. 2dBi for 2.4GHz, 3x int. 3dBi for 5GHz ===See also=== *[[TP-LINK Archer D2 v1.x]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7D2V1 TE7D2V1] (2014-10-29) :AC750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit ADSL2+ Modem Router *[[TP-LINK Archer D5 v1.x]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7D5V1 TE7D5V1] (2014-11-05) :AC1200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit ADSL2+ Modem Router *[[TP-LINK Archer D5 v2.x]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7D5V2 TE7D5V2] (2015-12-30) :AC1200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit ADSL2+ Modem Router *[[TP-LINK Archer D7 v1.x]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7D7V1 TE7D7V1] (2014-10-22) :AC1750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit ADSL2+ Modem Router *[[TP-LINK Archer D9 v1.x]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7D9V1 TE7D9V1] (2014-11-28) :AC1900 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit ADSL2+ Modem Router *[[TP-LINK Archer D20 v1.x]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7D20V1 TE7D20V1] (2015-11-25) :AC750 Wireless Dual Band ADSL2+ Modem Router *[[TP-LINK Archer D50 v1.x]] :AC1200 Wireless Dual Band ADSL2+ Modem Router ==Images== File:Archer_D7(UN)1.0-08.jpg File:Archer_D7(UN)1.0-09.jpg File:Archer_D7(UN)1.0-10.jpg File:Archer_D7(UN)1.0-11.jpg __NOTOC__
